name: Won Hwa Kim
content: Members | Medical Information Processing Professors Won Hwa Kim I am an Assistant Professor (2020 ‚Äì 2022) Associate Professor (from March 2023) in Graduate School of Artificial Intelligence (GSAI) / Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) / Medical Science and Engineering (MED) at Pohang University of Science and Technology (POSTECH). Prior to joining POSTECH, I was an Assistant Professor at the University of Texas at Arlington (2018 ‚Äì 2023, last 2 years on leave-of-absence), and was a Researcher in Data Science Team at NEC Labs., America (2017-2018). I obtained my Ph.D in Computer Science from University of Wisconsin ‚Äì Madison in 2017 thanks to great support from Prof.¬†Vikas Singh¬†(advisor). I got a M.S. in Robotics from KAIST (2010) and a B.S. in Electrical Engineering from Sungkyunkwan University (2008), and I developed Hybrid Vehicles at Hyundai Motors Company in 2010-2011. Please visit my website for more details. Ilwoo Lyu I am an assistant professor of Computer Science and Engineering and Graduate School of Artificial Intelligence at Pohang University of Science and Technology (POSTECH) and an adjoint assistant professor of Computer Science at Vanderbilt University. Prior to joining POSTECH, I was an assistant professor of Computer Science and Engineering at UNIST (2021-2024) and a research assistant professor of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science at Vanderbilt University (2017-2021). I earned my PhD in Computer Science at University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill (2017) and MS (2011) & BS at KAIST (2009). Please see my website.
